actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to exempt lands in the Kings River and Tulare Lake Basin, California, from certain acreage limitations of the Federal Reclamation Laws.

summary.text: Exempts the landholdings of United States citizens and current permanent resident aliens within the Kings River and Tulare Lake basin flood control project, California, from the acreage limitations of Federal reclamation laws. Requires specified successors in interest to such exempted land to pay interest annually on that part of the unpaid balance of the project's indebtedness for costs which is allocable on a pro rata basis to such land.

titles.title: A bill to exempt lands in the Kings River and Tulare Lake Basin, California, from certain acreage limitations of the Federal Reclamation Laws.
